Interface com.chimu.form.mapping.ObjectMapperXi

public interface ObjectMapperXi
extends ObjectMapper
The ObjectMapperXi interface provides additional functionality that can be used if a particular DomainObject (which must support the MappedObjectXi interface) wants to be part of the save process.

See Also:
MappedObjectXi
